languages.text: Долгий спуск на шаттле и высадка "вознаграждаются" угрюмым видом. Весь аванпост — это длинные ряды стандартных бараков, ангары для техники и большое здание штаба с антенной древнего монументального вокс-передатчика. Из-за двух солнц, висящих в небе, каждый объект имеет по две тени — зрелище необычное и смутно-тревожное. Комендант и его люди делают все возможное, чтобы обеспечить знатно{mf|му|й} гост{mf|ю|ье} достойный прием, но их ресурсы крайне скудны.

traits.locale_text: Долгий спуск на шаттле и высадка "вознаграждаются" угрюмым видом. Весь аванпост — это длинные ряды стандартных бараков, ангары для техники и большое здание штаба с антенной древнего монументального вокс-кастера. Из-за двух солнц, висящих в небе, каждый объект имеет по две тени — зрелище необычное и смутно-тревожное. Комендант и его люди делают все возможное, чтобы обеспечить знатно{mf|му|й} гост{mf|ю|ье} достойный прием, но их ресурсы крайне скудны.

languages.text: After a lengthy descent to the planet, you are rewarded with a dismal sight. The entire outpost consists of long columns of uniform bunkhouses, machine hangars, and a large headquarters topped with the massive antenna of an ancient vox-caster. The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguely disturbing. The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are scarce at best.
languages.original_text: Долгий спуск на шаттле и высадка "вознаграждаются" угрюмым видом. Весь аванпост — это длинные ряды стандартных бараков, ангары для техники и большое здание штаба с антенной древнего монументального вокс-передатчика. Из-за двух солнц, висящих в небе, каждый объект имеет по две тени — зрелище необычное и смутно-тревожное. Комендант и его люди делают все возможное, чтобы обеспечить знатно{mf|му|й} гост{mf|ю|ье} достойный прием, но их ресурсы крайне скудны.

traits.locale_text: The lengthy descent and the landing reward you with a dismal sight. The entire outpost consists of long columns of uniform bunkhouses, machine hangars and a large headquarters building topped with the massive antenna of an ancient vox-caster. The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguley disturbing. The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are at best scarce.

The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are at best scarce.

The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguely disturbing. The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are scarce at best.

After a lengthy descent to the planet, you are rewarded with a dismal sight. The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguely disturbing. After a lengthy descent to the planet, you are rewarded with a dismal sight. The entire outpost consists of long columns of uniform bunkhouses, machine hangars, and a large headquarters topped with the massive antenna of an ancient vox-caster. The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguely disturbing. The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are scarce at best.

languages.text: 漫长的降落过程结束之后，你看到了一片凄凉的景象。整个前哨站只有一排排整齐的工房、机库，还有一座大型指挥部。指挥部屋顶安装着古老通讯器的巨大天线。由于天空中有两颗恒星，行星上的每个物体都带着两个影子，这令你隐约感到不安。管理者和他的人想方设法，希望给你这位尊贵的客人符合身份的接待会，奈何他们的资源实在是太匮乏了。
languages.original_text: After a lengthy descent to the planet, you are rewarded with a dismal sight. The entire outpost consists of long columns of uniform bunkhouses, machine hangars, and a large headquarters topped with the massive antenna of an ancient vox-caster. The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguely disturbing. The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are scarce at best.

traits.locale_text: 漫长的降落过程结束之后，你看到了一片凄凉的景象。整个前哨站只有一排排整齐的工房、机库，还有一座大型指挥部。指挥部屋顶安装着古老通讯器的巨大天线。由于天空中有两颗恒星，行星上的每个物体都带着两个影子，这令你隐约感到不安。管理者和他的人想方设法，希望给你这位尊贵的客人符合身份的接待会，奈何他们的资源实在是太匮乏了。

languages.text: 惑星に降り立つと、悲惨な光景が広がっていた。前哨基地全体は、ズラッと長い列になって並ぶ宿泊小屋、機械格納庫、そして古代のヴォクスキャストの巨大なアンテナを備えた大本営で構成されている。空に浮かぶ二連の太陽があらゆる物体に二つの影を落とし、その光景には漠然とした不気味さを感じる。カストーディアンとその部下たちは、尊敬すべき客をもてなそうとあらゆる手を尽くすが、彼らの資源はどう見ても不足している。
languages.original_text: After a lengthy descent to the planet, you are rewarded with a dismal sight. The entire outpost consists of long columns of uniform bunkhouses, machine hangars, and a large headquarters topped with the massive antenna of an ancient vox-caster. The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguely disturbing. The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are scarce at best.

traits.locale_text: 惑星に降り立つと、悲惨な光景が広がっていた。前哨基地全体は、ズラッと長い列になって並ぶ宿泊小屋、機械格納庫、そして古代のヴォクスキャストの巨大なアンテナを備えた大本営で構成されている。空に浮かぶ二連の太陽があらゆる物体に二つの影を落とし、その光景には漠然とした不気味さを感じる。カストーディアンとその部下たちは、尊敬すべき客をもてなそうとあらゆる手を尽くすが、彼らの資源はどう見ても不足している。

languages.text: Tras un largo descenso hasta el planeta, te encuentras con un panorama desolador. Todo el puesto avanzado está formado por largas columnas de barracones uniformes, hangares de máquinas y un gran cuartel general coronado por la enorme antena de un antiguo voco amplificador. Los soles binarios que cuelgan del cielo hacen que cada objeto proyecte dos sombras, un espectáculo que te resulta un tanto inquietante. El custodio y su gente se desviven por dar a su estimad{mf|o|a} visitante una recepción adecuada, pero sus recursos son escasos cuanto menos.
languages.original_text: After a lengthy descent to the planet, you are rewarded with a dismal sight. The entire outpost consists of long columns of uniform bunkhouses, machine hangars, and a large headquarters topped with the massive antenna of an ancient vox-caster. The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguely disturbing. The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are scarce at best.

traits.locale_text: Tras un largo descenso hasta el planeta, te encuentras con un panorama desolador. Todo el puesto avanzado está formado por largas columnas de barracones uniformes, hangares de máquinas y un gran cuartel general coronado por la enorme antena de un antiguo voco amplificador. Los soles binarios que cuelgan del cielo hacen que cada objeto proyecte dos sombras, un espectáculo que te resulta un tanto inquietante. El custodio y su gente se desviven por dar a su estimad{mf|o|a} visitante una recepción adecuada, pero sus recursos son escasos cuanto menos.

languages.text: Nach einer langen Reise hinunter auf den Planeten wirst du von einem erbärmlichen Anblick begrüßt. Der gesamte Außenposten besteht aus langen Reihen von Schlafbaracken, Maschinenhangars und einem großen Hauptquartier, auf dem die gigantische Antenne eines uralten Vox-Transmitters thront. Die binären Sonnen, die am Himmel hängen, lassen jedes Objekt zwei Schatten werfen, ein Spektakel, das du leicht verstörend findest. Der Hüter und seine Leute tun alles, um den Ehrengast gebührend zu empfangen, verfügen aber vorsichtig ausgedrückt nur über spärliche Ressourcen.
languages.original_text: After a lengthy descent to the planet, you are rewarded with a dismal sight. The entire outpost consists of long columns of uniform bunkhouses, machine hangars, and a large headquarters topped with the massive antenna of an ancient vox-caster. The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguely disturbing. The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are scarce at best.

traits.locale_text: Nach einer langen Reise hinunter auf den Planeten wirst du von einem erbärmlichen Anblick begrüßt. Der gesamte Außenposten besteht aus langen Reihen von Schlafbaracken, Maschinenhangars und einem großen Hauptquartier, auf dem die gigantische Antenne eines uralten Vox-Transmitters thront. Die binären Sonnen, die am Himmel hängen, lassen jedes Objekt zwei Schatten werfen, ein Spektakel, das du leicht verstörend findest. Der Hüter und seine Leute tun alles, um den Ehrengast gebührend zu empfangen, verfügen aber vorsichtig ausgedrückt nur über spärliche Ressourcen.

languages.text: Après une longue descente jusqu'à la surface de la planète, vous êtes {mf|accueilli|accueillie} par un spectacle lugubre. L'avant-poste tout entier se résume à de longues rangées de baraquements identiques flanquées de quelques hangars et d'un vaste quartier général coiffé de l'antenne démesurée d'un ancien émetteur-vox. Les soleils jumeaux qui surplombent les lieux projettent pour chaque objet des ombres dédoublées, une vision qui vous paraît vaguement dérangeante. Le gardien et ses hommes se plient en quatre pour recevoir dignement leur hôte vénérable, mais leurs ressources sont cruellement limitées.
languages.original_text: After a lengthy descent to the planet, you are rewarded with a dismal sight. The entire outpost consists of long columns of uniform bunkhouses, machine hangars, and a large headquarters topped with the massive antenna of an ancient vox-caster. The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguely disturbing. The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are scarce at best.

L'avant-poste tout entier se résume à de longues rangées de baraquements identiques flanquées de quelques hangars et d'un vaste quartier général coiffé de l'antenne démesurée d'un ancien émetteur-vox. Les soleils jumeaux qui surplombent les lieux projettent pour chaque objet des ombres dédoublées, une vision qui vous paraît vaguement dérangeante. Le gardien et ses hommes se plient en quatre pour recevoir dignement leur hôte vénérable, mais leurs ressources sont cruellement limitées.

languages.text: Gezegene inişte uzunca bir süre geçirdikten sonra karşına iç karartan bir manzara çıkıyor. Koskoca karakol; uzun sıralar hâlinde birbirinin aynısı barakalar, makine hangarları ve üzerinde antika bir voksyayarın devasa anteninin olduğu geniş bir karargâhtan ibaret. Gökteki çift yıldızlar yüzünden her nesnenin iki gölgesinin olması, seni hafiften rahatsız ediyor. Karakolun sorumlusu ve adamları gelen saygın konuğu düzgün bir şekilde karşılamak için her türlü zahmete girse de kaynakları hiç yoktan hâllice.
languages.original_text: After a lengthy descent to the planet, you are rewarded with a dismal sight. The entire outpost consists of long columns of uniform bunkhouses, machine hangars, and a large headquarters topped with the massive antenna of an ancient vox-caster. The binary suns hanging in the sky make every object cast two shadows, a spectacle you find vaguely disturbing. The custodian and his people go out of their way to give the esteemed guest a proper reception, but their resources are scarce at best.
